goal.ch: “近年來,社會企業的概念如雨後春筍般蓬勃發展,然而到底何謂「社會企業」?其和一般的企業有何差異?而國際和國內又有哪些成功的社會企業案例呢?其有何獨特之處值得借鑑?此外,要如何將社會企業的理念運用到客庄發展,以促進客庄之繁榮,進而吸引年輕人才返鄉就業?其次,在客家社區普遍面臨年輕人口外移的情況下,該如何保存地方傳統文化?又該如何讓客庄傳統產業導入創新元素,進而發揚光大?在在皆是本課程所欲探討的焦點。有鑑於此,本課程擬採理論講授、個案分享、課堂討論和小組報告等之方式,帶領大家一同走進社會企業之浩瀚世界,期望同學們在修完這堂課程後,除了學會理性的分析事情之外,更多了份人文關懷和環境永續之熱忱。讓吾等共同加油,努力朝目標邁進吧!“
goal.en: “In recent years, the concept of social enterprise has mushroomed, but in the end what is ““social enterprise““ and its general business What is the difference? And what international and domestic success of social enterprise case? What is unique In addition, how to apply the concept of social enterprise to the development of the village to promote the prosperity of the Chuang, and then attract young people to return home employment? Secondly, the Hakka community is generally faced with young population migration situation, how to How to make the traditional industries of Chuangzhuang into innovative elements, and then carry forward? Are in this course are the focus of discussion. In view of this, this course will adopt theory teaching, case sharing, classroom discussions and group reports, etc., to lead everyone into the vast world of social enterprises, students expect the completion of this course, Rational analysis of things, the more copies of the humane care and environmental sustainability of enthusiasm. Let us work together to make progress towards the goal!“

textbook.ch:
“1.胡哲生、梁瓊丹、卓秀足、吳宗昇(2013)。我們的小幸福、小經濟:9 個社會企業熱 血、追夢實戰故事。台北市:新自然主義、幸福綠光。
2.社企流著(2014)。社企力!社會企業=翻轉世界的變革力量。用愛創業,做好事又能獲 利!台北市:果力文化。
參考書目
李宛蓉(譯)(2011)。誰說偉大的事都被有錢人做完了(Muhammad Yunus 原著)。台北市:大是文化。
2. 曾育慧(譯)(2011)。富足世界不是夢:讓貧窮去逃亡吧!(Muhammad Yunus 原著)。台北市:博雅書局。
3. 洪鑫(譯)(2007)。尤努斯與鄉村銀行─創造免於貧窮的世界(Asif Dowla ＆ Dipal Barua原著)。台北市:日月文化。
4. 其他社會企業相關書籍、雜誌、影片“
textbook.en:
“1. Hu Zhesheng, Liang Qiongdan, Zhuo Xiuzu, Wu Zongsheng (2013). Our small happiness, small economy: nine social enterprise blood, dream real combat story. Taipei: New Naturalism, Happiness Green.
2. Social enterprise flow (2014). Social enterprise = the power to change the world. With love business, good things can be profitable! Taipei: fruit culture.
bibliography
Li Wanrong (translation) (2011). Who said the great things are done by the rich (Muhammad Yunus original). Taipei: Great is culture.
2. Zeng Yuhui (translation) (2011). The rich world is not a dream: let the poor go to flee! (Muhammad Yunus original). Taipei City: Burson-Marsteller.
Hong Xin (translation) (2007). Yunus and the Village Bank - Creating a World Free from Poverty (Asif Dowla ＆ Dipal Barua). Taipei City: the sun and the moon culture.
4. Other social enterprise related books, magazines, videos“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討

個別指導

gradMethod.ch: 1.課堂參與、小組討論、個人學習回饋單： 40％ ; 2.期中考： 30％ ; 3.期末小組報告： 30％。
gradMethod.en: “1. Class participation, group discussion, individual learning feedback 40％; 2. Mid-term exam 30％; 3. The end of the group report 30％.“

officeHour.en: Monday 12:30~13:00 Make an appointment with the teacher

stus.department: 數學系(計算與資料科學組)
